runs.comm: length ball in the channel outside off, thrusts the hands out in front and guides the ball down to third man

pitched up to the left-hander, who drives off the inside half of the bat down the pitch, mid-on and mid-off converge, the throw misses at the bowler's end and Buttler then whips off the bails for good measure but Rahane was home
goes back and runs one more down to third man
pitched up on off stump, leans into a drive but can't get this one away
length ball, angled across, goes back and slides one towards gully
short of a length, on the stumps, Dhawan hops back in to the crease, dobs the ball down on to the pitch
around the wicket, tossed up outside leg stump, wide called
gets down on one knee, swings this away behind square, superb connection on that sweep from Rahane and that's the first six of the innings disappearing over the rope
flatter and quicker, bowled behind his legs! Rahane got too far across, he was aiming for the same part of the ground, mistimed the shot and it skidded through to clatter leg stump
length ball, pushed across, drops back in the crease and runs one to short third man
continues around the wicket to the lefty, opens the face and pushes to backward point
gets on the front foot, dabs this softly in front of square and immediately sets off for one
tossed up on middle and leg, goes back and pushes towards the bowler
over the wicket, angled in and clubbed through the leg side, straight to the man at deep midwicket on the bounce
pitched up outside off, drives hard but extra cover leaps to intercept it
full and straight, lovely wristwork from Kohli, reaches forwards and whips the ball over midwicket, there's no one out there to prevent four
slower ball, skips out but can't get the drive away, Gurney fields
uses the feet again, drives back past the bowler and there's a comfortable single there
good length outside off, Dhawan opens up his stance and punches straight to point from the crease
starts on a tight line, worked back to the on side, mid-on trots in to prevent a single
pitched up on off stump, Kohli whips this behind square on the leg side, outrageous shot and it lands almost directly on the boundary marker... Signalled four
too short this time, Kohli wrists move like quicksilver again, flicking the ball in a high arc over the 45, down to the fine leg boundary for four more
goes full again, Kohli backs away and larrups four more through extra cover! Wonderful strokeplay, Woakes being given a chasing at the moment
slower ball, bouncing up on the stumps and Kohli, for once, mistimes his shot, the ball hitting him in the padding
good ball to finish from Woakes, yorker length and dug out to midwicket
slower ball, outside off, whipped through the leg side
pitched up outside off, Kohli drives and the bat turns in his hands, bobbles to mid-off
back of a length, Kohli on the charge, swipes across the line, pulls flat down towards long-on
Dhawan now tries to make room, Gurney goes wide of the stumps, swing and a miss
Dhawan lassoes this one, cutter on middle and leg, heaves across the line and sends this over the rope at deep backward square!
bit of width, on the back foot, chopped through point and they run hard for a couple more
pitched up in the channel outside off, stays back in the crease and runs one to third man
fine leg is up, this is short and at the body, swivel-pulled behind square, in the air but the man on the circle had no chance
short and on the hips again, this time shovelled away for a single
pitched up around off stump, Kohli skips nimbly forward to drive, mid-off is slightly back and there's one more
leg-stump line, Dhawan nearly upends himself trying to launch this over square leg, struck on the pad and the ball drops down on to the turf
more punishment for Finn's leg-stump line, weight back and hoicked high over deep backward square, to the delight of the crowd
lovely, late cut sends this fine of short third man, Kohli waited on a length ball outside off, dabbed it past the fielder using the pace from the bowler
worked away into the leg side and they come dashing back for the second
pitched up on middle and leg, dug out for a single to long-on
goes around the wicket to Dhawan, slower ball out the back of the hand but it sits up nicely, pulled mercilessly through backward square for another boundary
loses his radar here, well down the leg side, maybe another back-of-the-hand delivery
pitched up, 77mph on off stump, punched through point to the sweeper
slower ball outside off, touch short and pulled through midwicket for one more into the deep
around the wicket, tossed up on middle and leg, can only work this back to the bowler
flighted, again uses the feet, works this wider for one to long-on
drags his length back a touch, driven into the ground and Tredwell fields
tossed up on off stump, uses the feet and clips one more to long-on
goes back and steers one towards backward point, fielder couldn't gather it cleanly and they get the single
on the stumps, tight stuff from Tredwell, worked to long-on for another single
length ball, Dhawan coming down the track, played back to the bowler
length ball, comes out and flicks into a gap at midwicket
sixer, way back over wide long-on! Tossed up and Kholi got out to the pitch, slapped it into the stands
flat trajectory on the stumps, worked sensibly to leg for a single
slightly short and pulled through square leg
flighted, on middle and off, Kohli comes forward and wristily turns through midwicket for one more
here comes Virat again, uses the feet and chips this over extra cover, picks the gap superbly, four more
on the stumps and worked for a single into the leg side... Kohli wanted two
around the wicket, tossed up, Dhawan sweeps and misses on leg stump, hit on the pads but Tredwell's appeal is turned down
drags this shorter and quicker, punched off the back foot through mid-on
tossed up, comes forward, works one to long-on
full toss from Tredwell, pulled flat through midwicket to the man in the deep, Tredders got away with that one

straight on a length, Dhawan aims leg side, misses and loses his leg stump! So the change works for England, they needed a wicket badly. Nothing special about this, just a slog across the line and a total miss, the ball hitting the top of leg stump, Dhawan was trying to whack that miles
fuller length on off stump, pushed out gently to deep cover
length on middle and off, Kohli steps across and pushes through square leg
full on the stumps, pressed in the air towards mid-off, looking to go over the fielder I think, this lands well short of the fielder
short and helped on it's way down the leg side, Finn scrambles well to his left from long leg to slide and save four
down the wicket, Woakes cramps him up with a back of length delivery that strikes the chest I think and deflects behind point for a leg bye
fired into off stump, pressed off the back foot to extra cover
down the track giving himself room, smears a length ball out to deep cover
stays around for the right-hander, Kohli down the wicket too, meets this on the full and plays to long-on for a single
down the wicket, aiming leg side and picked it up well enough into the crowd, Raina looked to be keen to have a go at Tredwell and he's whacked this against the turn over long-on
more air, gently dabbed up on the leg side for an easy single
full on the stumps, flicked down to long-on for a simple single to end the over
full at the leg stump, Kohli gave himself room and steered this out to long-on
cutter outside off, a little short, only pulled as far as deep midwicket
yorker length, dabbed into midwicket, everyone's out on the rope on the leg side, they can run hard and sprint back for the second here, fifty for Kohli in 34 balls
oh unlucky for Woakes, slower ball, Kohli plays forward, deceived, tries to jam down on it and gets a thin inside edge past leg stump to fine leg
length on off stump, Kohli staying leg side of it drives firmly and steers this past short third man
Kohli gives himself a bit of room again, Woakes tries to fire it in at the pad, drifts it down leg
cutter at 76mph, Kohli dabs from off stump to the left of short third man for a quick single
down the track and whipping this past midwicket to the gap between two deep fielders, great shot
goes for a paddle sweep and gets a bit of a top edge, Gurney coming across from short long leg diving to his left and just can't hold on with his left hand
gorgeous shot, down the track and opening the face to steer this wide of long-on, the timing was so good
touch short, pulled hard out to deep midwicket
down the track and calmly knocking this out to long-on
full on leg stump, tickled around the corner for another easy single
slower ball, 72mph, sat back for and a mistimed pull to deep square

short ball, Kohli was coming down the wicket, tries to hook, gets it high in the air and is taken at deep square! Huge strike for England. Kohli in absolutely no control at all of the stroke, lobbed it up, deep square charged in a held a very good catch sliding forward
slow offcutter back of a length, steered carefully to deep square, this carefully along the floor
just short of a good length on the stumps, Dhoni dabs this backward of square on the leg side and runs hard to get back for the second
back on the stumps playing towards extra cover
back of a length, pulled with a short-arm jab to deep midwicket
down the wicket and trying to launch this over the leg side, only finds deep square
down the track to a flighted ball, this is pressed carefully out to long-off
reverse swept straight to short third man, Dhoni goes for a single, Finn fires to the non-striker's end, direct hit would have had him, it bounced just over
very full, worked out to backward square
down the wicket, goes to flick a full ball into the leg side, struck low on the pad that runs to short third man, very sharp single taken again
very full once more, steered just backward of point and they scramble another run
slower short ball, 71mph, pulled out to deep midwicket from outside off
another slower short ball, this is pulled to deep square and it's just a single again
excellent yorker, dug out and it bounces towards the keeper, Dhoni through for a quick single and Raina darts up the other end
around the wicket, very low full toss which Dhoni slaps down to long-on, set well back in his crease

beauty, spearing yorker that cleans Raina up! That is perfect, some in drift right onto the base of the stumps, Raina too slow to get down to it, the ball flicks his left heel and knocks out leg stump. That is how to bowl a yorker
nice and full again, not quite the yorker, punched down to long-on
full and just wide of off stump so Jadeja can flay his arms at it, squirts it just out of reach of short third man diving backwards and there's the boundary India need
length on off stump, nice and tight this, just defended and Dhoni calls a sharp single
short ball, Dhoni throws everything at the hook and missed, hits him on the shoulder and runs wide of point for, well a run in the end, no glove on that

clears the front leg and tries to clear the leg side, nothing like a proper connection, it rolls out to deep square and oh dear, Jadeja wants a second that isn't there in a month of Sunday's, sent back from Dhoni, the throw comes into the bowler's end and Jadeja is easily run out. Never a second available, Dhoni with the correct call and Jadeja throws his wicket away, bonus for England
another short ball and Dhoni is hit again trying to pull, it deflects into the covers for a single
back of a length, tried to be swung leg side but it comes off the toe I think and runs just wide of Finn's left hand for a single
cutter, 75 mph, swung from outside off, gets a thick inside edge past a diving Buttler and they get a couple as long leg chases to his right
full and miles wide of off stump, got that wrong, missed the cut strip almost
full, angled in, tried to be swung to leg, runs off the pad, narrowly avoids off stump, they take a leg bye as Buttler charges to his right
goes for the yorker, misses it by a few inches and Dhoni whacks it to the midwicket fence, almost carried it for six
another low full toss but this is patted only to deep extra cover for a single, Gurney gets away with one, Dhoni off strike crucially

full, it slips very narrowly down leg side, well by a coat of pain really, the batsman went a long way across his stumps trying to swing leg side, fair enough call, in a normal stance that would have hit the pads
full outside off, only finds point, big two dots!
full on the stumps, Dhoni back in his crease and lumps this over midwicket into the crowd! Huge strike, sails back

slower ball, pulled out into the leg side, Moeen is fielding at deep square, no second available but Dhoni coming back regardless, the throw is wide and the relay throw to the bowler's end is not in time!
slower ball, short of a length again, pulled to midwicket, no connection at all, right off the toe, Dhoni refuses the single!
slower again, back and slugged...just over mid-off's head! It skips away from the fielder and into the boundary, surely a big miscue but enough club to get it over Morgan's head
huge swing aiming leg side, it runs out to deep square but Dhoni says no to the single yet again!
goes short, Dhoni aims hard leg side and doesn't get it at all! Runs to Moeen at deep square again and they jog just the single
